text: terbreeding some of the Cloister Melchizedek families with the Hebrew-Melchizedeks and promoting the patriarchal Templar Creed, which became the primary focus of the Essene Brotherhood teachings. By 1150 BC the Priests of Ur disassociated themselves from the primary fam- ilies of the Essene brotherhood, and began working with a few select families within the Essenes, and the Hibiru and Melchizedek Cloisters. These families were chosen to reintegrate the undistorted pure Templar teachings and to work directly with the Priests of Ur to ensure the race preparation for the ascension wave of 2017 AD. In 700 BC the Ra Confederacy gave the Azur- ites equal directive control over human evolution and appointed them pri- mary guardians of the Covenant of Palaidor. The Azurites began their work on Earth through the Essenes of the Priests of Ur. In 196 BC the Azurites and the Sirian Council attempted to mend the growing rift within the 97
